<title>DEF 14A</title>

<p style="line-height:4.0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:2pt;border-bottom:1px solid #000000"> </p> <p align="center" style="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:18pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>UNITED STATES </b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:18pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION </b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>Washington, D.C. 20549 </b></p> <p align="center" style="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:18pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>SCHEDULE 14A </b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>(Rule <font style="white-space:nowrap">14a-101)</font> </b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>INFORMATION REQUIRED IN </b></p> <p align="center" style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>PROXY STATEMENT

<center><div align="left" style="width:8.5in">
<p align="center" style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">
<img alt="LOGO" src="g867884g65f41.jpg"/>
</p> <p align="center" style="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>The Brinks Company </b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">1801 Bayberry Court </p> <p align="center" style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">P.O. Box 18100 </p>
<p align="center" style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Richmond, VA 23226-8100 </p> <p align="right" style="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">March 27, 2020 </p>
<p style="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">To Our Shareholders: </p> <p style="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">On behalf of the Board of Directors, we invite you to attend
the annual meeting of shareholders of The Brinks Company on Friday, May 8, 2020 at 10:00 a.m. local time at the Hilton Dallas/Southlake Town Square, 1400 Plaza Place, Southlake, Texas 76092. </p>
<p style="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">2019 capped off our three year strategic plan period in which we exceeded the financial targets we set out for the Company in March 2017 through the execution of
breakthrough initiatives to increase efficiency and profitability and disciplined execution of accretive acquisitions. Our Compensation Committee and Board continue to adhere to a philosophy that aligns pay and performance through awards of annual
and long-term incentives that balance management performance and shareholder returns. Despite the uncertainty we and other companies are experiencing in early 2020, we believe we are well-positioned for success over our next three year plan period.
We remain dedicated to growing our Company and continuing to deliver value to our shareholders, while maintaining our high standards of corporate governance and our unwavering commitment to safety and security for our customers and employees. </p>
<p style="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Your vote at the annual shareholder meeting is important. Whether or not you plan to attend the meeting, we urge you to vote as soon as possible. There are two ways to
vote. You can complete, sign, date and return the enclosed proxy in the envelope provided or you can vote on the internet. </p> <p style="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">We look forward to seeing you at the
annual meeting and thank you for your continued support. </p> <p style="margin-top:18pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Sincerely, </p> <p style="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p>

Officer</p></td>
<td valign="bottom"> </td>
<td valign="top"> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>Michael J. Herling</b></p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Chairman of the Board</p></td></tr>
</tbody></table> <p style="font-size:240pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="line-height:8.0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:2pt;border-bottom:1px solid #000000;width:16%"> </p>

</p> <p style="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="line-height:1.0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:2pt;border-bottom:1.00pt solid #0033a0"> </p>
<p style="font-size:15pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p align="center" style="margin-top:-15pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:18pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#0033a0"><b>NOTICE OF ANNUAL MEETING OF SHAREHOLDERS </b></font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:18pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#0033a0"><b>TO BE HELD MAY 8, 2020 </b></font></p> <p style="font-size:4pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p>
<p style="line-height:1.0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:2pt;border-bottom:1.00pt solid #0033a0"> </p> <p style="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">The annual meeting of shareholders of THE BRINKS
COMPANY will be held on May 8, 2020 at 10:00 a.m. local time at the Hilton Dallas/Southlake Town Square, 1400 Plaza Place, Southlake, Texas 76092 for the following purposes: </p>
<p style="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p>
<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" width="100%">
<tbody><tr style="page-break-inside:avoid">
<td align="left" valign="top" width="4%">1.</td>
<td align="left" valign="top"> <p align="left" style=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL; ">To elect as directors the nine nominees to the Board of Directors named in the accompanying proxy statement, for terms
expiring in 2021. </p></td></tr></tbody></table> <p style="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p>
<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" width="100%">
<tbody><tr style="page-break-inside:avoid">
<td align="left" valign="top" width="4%">2.</td>
<td align="left" valign="top"> <p align="left" style=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL; ">To approve an advisory resolution on named executive officer compensation. </p></td></tr></tbody></table>
<p style="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p>
<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" width="100%">
<tbody><tr style="page-break-inside:avoid">
<td align="left" valign="top" width="4%">3.</td>
<td align="left" valign="top"> <p align="left" style=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL; ">To approve the selection of KPMG LLP as the Companys independent registered public accounting firm for the fiscal
year ending December 31, 2020. </p></td></tr></tbody></table> <p style="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p>
<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" width="100%">
<tbody><tr style="page-break-inside:avoid">
<td align="left" valign="top" width="4%">4.</td>
<td align="left" valign="top"> <p align="left" style=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL; ">To transact such other business as may properly come before the meeting or any adjournment or postponement thereof.
</p></td></tr></tbody></table> <p style="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">The close of business on March 2, 2020 has been fixed as the record date for determining the shareholders entitled to notice of and to vote
at the annual meeting. This proxy statement and the accompanying form of proxy and annual report to shareholders are being mailed to shareholders of record as of the close of business on March 2, 2020, commencing on or about April 6, 2020.
</p> <p style="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Please note that brokers may not vote your shares on the election of directors or the advisory vote on named executive officer compensation in the absence of your
specific instructions as to how to vote. </p> <p style="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">We intend to hold our annual meeting in person. However, we are actively monitoring the coronavirus <font style="white-space:nowrap">(COVID-19)</font> and we are sensitive to the public health and travel concerns our shareholders may have and the protocols that federal, state, and local governments may impose. In the event it is not possible or
advisable to hold our annual meeting in person, we will announce alternative arrangements for the meeting as promptly as practicable, which may include holding the meeting solely by means of remote communication. Please monitor our annual meeting
website at http://investors.brinks.com/2020annualmeetingmaterials for updated information. If you are planning to attend our meeting, please check the website one week prior to the meeting date. As always, we encourage you to vote your shares prior
to the annual meeting. </p> <p style="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>YOUR VOTE IS IMPORTANT. WHETHER OR NOT YOU PLAN TO ATTEND THE MEETING, PLEASE MARK, SIGN, DATE AND MAIL THE ENCLOSED PROXY CARD OR VOTE ON
THE INTERNET. A RETURN ENVELOPE IS ENCLOSED FOR YOUR CONVENIENCE. </b></p> <p style="margin-top:24pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Lindsay K. Blackwood </p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><i>Secretary </i></p> <p style="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">March 27, 2020 </p>
<p style="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p><div style="max-width:100%;margin-left:0%; margin-right:0%;border:solid 1px;background-color:;;padding-top:2pt;padding-bottom:3pt">
<p align="center" style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-top:2pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING THE AVAILABILITY OF PROXY MATERIALS FOR THE </b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>SHAREHOLDER MEETING TO BE HELD ON MAY 8, 2020. </b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>The annual report to shareholders and proxy statement are available at: </b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-bottom:2pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>http://investors.brinks.com/2020annualmeetingmaterials </b></p></div>
</div></center>

</p></body></html><html><head></head><body><h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>
<center><div align="left" style="width:8.5in">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:11pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#0033a0"><b>The Brinks Company </b></font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:24pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#0033a0"><a name="toc867884_1"></a>PROXY SUMMARY </font></p>
<p style="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p><div style="position:relative;float:left; width:48%;padding-right:0%;padding-bottom:8pt;overflow:hidden;padding-top:3pt">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">To help you review The Brinks Companys (Brinks or the Company) 2020 proxy
statement, we have summarized several key topics below. The following description is only a summary.
</p></div><div style="position:relative;float:left; margin-left:3%; width:49%;padding-right:0%;padding-bottom:8pt;overflow:hidden;padding-top:3pt">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">For more complete information about these topics, please review the complete proxy statement and the Companys 2019
Annual Report on Form <font style="white-space:nowrap">10-K.</font> </p></div><div style="clear:both; height:0pt; font-size:0pt"> </div>
<p style="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:14pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>2019 Highlights </b></p>
<p style="line-height:4.0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:2pt;border-bottom:1px solid #0033a0"> </p>
<p style="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p><div style="position:relative;float:left; width:48%;padding-right:0%;padding-bottom:8pt;overflow:hidden;padding-top:3pt">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Brinks is the global leader in total cash management, route-based logistics and payment solutions, including <font style="white-space:nowrap"><font style="white-space:nowrap">cash-in-transit,</font></font> ATM services, cash management services, including vault outsourcing, money processing and intelligent safe services, and international transportation of
valuables to financial institutions, retailers, government agencies (including central banks), mints, jewelers and other commercial operations around the world. We serve customers in more than 100 countries and have approximately
</p></div><div style="position:relative;float:left; margin-left:3%; width:49%;padding-right:0%;padding-bottom:8pt;overflow:hidden;padding-top:3pt">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">
64,600 employees worldwide. A significant portion of our business is conducted internationally, with approximately 67% of our revenues earned outside the United States. Brinks reported
strong earnings growth in 2019. Following are key financial performance metrics that are monitored by management and the Board, reported to shareholders, and used in determining 2019 compensation for the named executive officers.
</p></div><div style="clear:both; height:0pt; font-size:0pt"> </div>
<p style="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="font-size:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p align="center" style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">
<img alt="LOGO" src="g867884g38g27.jpg"/>
</p> <p style="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="line-height:8.0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:2pt;border-bottom:1px solid #000000;width:16%"> </p>
<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:8pt" width="100%">
<tbody><tr style="page-break-inside:avoid">
<td align="left" valign="top" width="4%">*</td>
<td align="left" valign="top"> <p align="left" style=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:8pt; font-family:ARIAL; ">These <font style="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</font> financial measures are not presented in accordance with U.S.
generally accepted accounting principles (GAAP). See page 34 of the Companys Annual Report on Form <font style="white-space:nowrap">10-K</font> for the year ended December 31, 2019 for a reconciliation of <font style="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</font> operating profit and revenue to the most directly comparable GAAP financial measures. </p></td></tr></tbody></table> <p style="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:14pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>Executive
Compensation Program </b></p> <p style="line-height:4.0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:2pt;border-bottom:1px solid #0033a0"> </p>
<p style="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p><div style="position:relative;float:left; width:48%;padding-right:0%;padding-bottom:8pt;overflow:hidden;padding-top:3pt">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Our executive compensation program is structured to link compensation to Company and individual performance over the
short- and long-term and to align the interests of executives and shareholders. We do this by using shares of the Companys common stock (Brinks Common Stock) and
stock-</p></div><div style="position:relative;float:left; margin-left:3%; width:49%;padding-right:0%;padding-bottom:8pt;overflow:hidden;padding-top:3pt">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">
based awards in our incentive compensation programs and by maintaining robust executive stock ownership guidelines. Elements of compensation for Brinks executives include base salary,
annual incentives and long-term incentives (LTI). </p></div><div style="clear:both; height:0pt; font-size:0pt"> </div>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt"> </p>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" width="100%">
<tbody><tr>
<td width="97%"></td>
<td valign="bottom" width="1%"></td>
<td></td>
<td></td>
<td></td></tr>
<tr style="font-size:1pt">
<td height="2" style="BORDER-RIGHT:1.00pt solid #0033a0; padding-left:8pt"> </td>
<td colspan="4" height="2"></td></tr>
<tr style="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<td align="right" style="padding-bottom:2pt ;BORDER-RIGHT:1.00pt solid #0033a0; padding-left:8pt" valign="top"><i><sub style="font-size:85%; vertical-align:bottom">
<img alt="LOGO" src="g867884g23_51.jpg"/>
</sub>    2020 Proxy Statement  </i></td>
<td valign="bottom"> </td>
<td style="padding-bottom:2pt ;" valign="bottom"><b> </b></td>
<td align="right" style="padding-bottom:2pt ;" valign="bottom"><b>  1</b></td>

</div></center>

<center><div align="left" style="width:8.5in">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:11pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#0033a0"><b>The Brinks Company </b></font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:14pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>Performance-Based and Variable Compensation in 2019 </b></p>
<p style="line-height:4.0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:2pt;border-bottom:1px solid #0033a0"> </p> <p style="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:9pt" width="100%">
<tbody><tr>
<td width="14%"></td>
<td valign="bottom" width="1%"></td>
<td width="2%"></td>
<td valign="bottom" width="1%"></td>
<td width="79%"></td>
<td valign="bottom" width="1%"></td>
<td width="2%"></td></tr>
<tr style="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:9pt">
<td bgcolor="#0033a0" style="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #ffffff" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:1pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:0.67em; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#ffffff"><b>Annual</b></font></p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; margin-left:0.67em; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#ffffff"><b>Incentives</b></font></p></td>
<td valign="bottom"> </td>
<td valign="top"> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL">    </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL"></p></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" style=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #ffffff" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" style="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #ffffff" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:1pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>Annual Incentive
Award</b></p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL"><i>Provides a cash award based on achievement of <font style="white-space:nowrap">pre-established</font> <font style="white-space:nowrap">one-year</font> <font style="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</font> operating profit and revenue goals as well as free cash flow results and individual performance.</i></p> <p style="font-size:4pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt"> </p></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>    </b></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b></b></p></td></tr>
<tr style="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:9pt">
<td bgcolor="#0033a0" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:1pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:0.67em; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#ffffff"><b>Long
Term</b></font></p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; margin-left:0.67em; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#ffffff"><b>Incentives </b></font></p></td>
<td valign="bottom"> </td>
<td valign="top"></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:1pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>Internal Metric Performance Share Units (Internal
Metric PSUs)</b></p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL"><i>Paid out in shares of Brinks Common Stock at the end of a three-year performance period, based on achievement of a <font style="white-space:nowrap">pre-established</font> three-year total <font style="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</font> EBITDA performance goal, and subject to a three-year vesting requirement. Represents 50% of the total LTI award for the Chief
Executive Officer and 25% of the total LTI award for the other named executive officers.</i></p> <p style="font-size:4pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt"> </p></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"></td></tr>
<tr style="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:9pt">
<td bgcolor="#0033a0" valign="top"></td>
<td valign="bottom"> </td>
<td valign="top"></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>Relative Total Shareholder Return (TSR) Performance Share Units (Relative TSR PSUs)</b></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL"><i>Paid out in shares of Brinks Common Stock at the end of a three-year performance period, based on the Companys TSR relative to that of companies in the
S&amp;P MidCap 400 with foreign revenues equal to or exceeding 50% of total revenues. Represents 25% of the total LTI award for each of the named executive officers.</i></p> <p style="font-size:4pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt"> </p></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"></td></tr>
<tr style="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:9pt">
<td bgcolor="#0033a0" valign="top"></td>
<td valign="bottom"> </td>
<td valign="top"></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>Stock Options</b></p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL"><i>Each option represents the
opportunity to purchase one share of Brinks Common Stock at the end of a threeyear vesting period at the price per share on the grant date. Represents 25% of the total LTI award for each of the named executive officers.</i></p>
<p style="font-size:4pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt"> </p></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"></td></tr>
<tr style="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:9pt">
<td bgcolor="#0033a0" valign="top"></td>
<td valign="bottom"> </td>
<td valign="top"></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>Restricted Stock Units (RSUs)</b></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL"><i>Paid out in shares of Brinks Common Stock and vesting in three equal annual installments. Represents 25% of the total LTI award for the named executive officers
other than the Chief Executive Officer.</i></p> <p style="font-size:6pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt"> </p></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"></td></tr>
</tbody></table>
<p style="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p><div style="position:relative;float:left; width:48%;padding-right:0%;padding-bottom:8pt;overflow:hidden;padding-top:3pt">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">In 2019, performance-based compensation (which includes annual incentives, Internal Metric PSUs, Relative TSR PSUs, and
Stock Options) represented approximately 88% of total target compensation for the Chief Executive Officer and approximately 59% of
</p></div><div style="position:relative;float:left; margin-left:3%; width:49%;padding-right:0%;padding-bottom:8pt;overflow:hidden;padding-top:3pt">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">
total target compensation (on average) for the Companys other named executive officers who were serving as of December 31, 2019, as illustrated below. See pages 37-41 for additional
information about the long-term incentive awards. </p></div><div style="clear:both; height:0pt; font-size:0pt"> </div>
<p style="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="font-size:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p align="center" style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">
<img alt="LOGO" src="g867884g76s72.jpg"/>
</p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt"> </p>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" width="100%">
<tbody><tr>
<td></td>
<td valign="bottom" width="1%"></td>
<td width="97%"></td></tr>
<tr style="font-size:1pt">
<td height="2"></td>
<td colspan="2" height="2" style="BORDER-LEFT:1.00pt solid #0033a0"> </td></tr>
<tr style="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<td style="padding-bottom:2pt ;" valign="top"><b>2  </b></td>
<td style=" BORDER-LEFT:1.00pt solid #0033a0" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td style="padding-bottom:2pt ;" valign="top"><i>  <sub style="font-size:85%; vertical-align:bottom">
<img alt="LOGO" src="g867884g23_51.jpg"/>
</sub>    2020 Proxy Statement</i></td></tr></tbody></table>
</div></center>
<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always">
</p></body></html><html><head></head><body><h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>
<center><div align="left" style="width:8.5in">
<p align="right" style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:11pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#0033a0"><b>PROXY SUMMARY </b></font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:14pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>2019 Compensation Decisions </b></p>
<p style="line-height:4.0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:2pt;border-bottom:1px solid #0033a0"> </p>
<p style="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p><div style="position:relative;float:left; width:48%;padding-right:0%;padding-bottom:8pt;overflow:hidden;padding-top:3pt">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">In February 2019, the Compensation and Benefits Committee (the Compensation Committee) approved LTI awards of
Internal Metric PSUs, Relative TSR PSUs, Stock Options and RSUs to the Companys named executive officers. Payouts of 2019 annual incentives to named executive officers were approved by the Compensation Committee in February 2020 ranging from
approximately 77% to 107% of target (depending on the named executive officer), reflecting corporate performance, performance in the countries within each executives area of responsibility (where applicable), and individual performance. The
corporate performance factor for 2019 payouts was determined by performance that was below the target levels of the <font style="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</font> operating profit and <font style="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</font> revenue goals,
as well as performance slightly below the free
</p></div><div style="position:relative;float:left; margin-left:3%; width:49%;padding-right:0%;padding-bottom:8pt;overflow:hidden;padding-top:3pt">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">
cash flow performance goal. In February 2020, the Compensation Committee also approved payouts for LTI awards granted in 2017, which consisted of Internal Metric PSUs, Relative TSR PSUs and RSUs.
Relative TSR PSUs were paid out in shares of Brinks Common Stock at 150% of target, reflecting relative TSR above the 75th percentile of peer companies and stock price appreciation of approximately 226% over the three-year period. Internal
Metric PSUs were paid out in shares of Brinks Common Stock at 200% of target, reflecting performance that was above the target level for the three-year <font style="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</font> operating profit goal beginning
January 1, 2017 and ending December 31, 2019. These compensation decisions are more fully described in the Compensation Discussion and Analysis, beginning on page 27.
</p></div><div style="clear:both; height:0pt; font-size:0pt"> </div>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt"> </p>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" width="100%">

<td valign="bottom" width="1%"></td>

<td></td>
<td></td></tr>
<tr style="font-size:1pt">

<td colspan="4" height="2"></td></tr>
<tr style="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<td align="right" style="padding-bottom:2pt ;BORDER-RIGHT:1.00pt solid #0033a0; padding-left:8pt" valign="top"><i><sub style="font-size:85%; vertical-align:bottom">
<img alt="LOGO" src="g867884g23_51.jpg"/>
</sub>    2020 Proxy Statement  </i></td>
<td valign="bottom"> </td>

<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always">
</p></body></html><html><head></head><body><h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>
<center><div align="left" style="width:8.5in">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:11pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#0033a0"><b>The Brinks Company </b></font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:14pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>Corporate Governance </b></p>
<p style="line-height:4.0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:2pt;border-bottom:1px solid #0033a0"> </p>
<p style="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p><div style="position:relative;float:left; width:48%;padding-right:0%;padding-bottom:8pt;overflow:hidden;padding-top:3pt">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Brinks is committed to good corporate governance and employs a number of practices that the Companys Board of
Directors (the Board) has
</p></div><div style="position:relative;float:left; margin-left:3%; width:49%;padding-right:0%;padding-bottom:8pt;overflow:hidden;padding-top:3pt">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">
determined are in the best interest of the Company and our shareholders. Following are examples of those practices.
</p></div><div style="clear:both; height:0pt; font-size:0pt"> </div>
<p style="font-size:10pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p align="center" style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>What We Do and Dont Do:
</b></p> <p style="font-size:10pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:9.5pt" width="100%">
<tbody><tr>
<td width="27%"></td>
<td valign="bottom" width="1%"></td>
<td width="1%"></td>
<td valign="bottom" width="1%"></td>
<td width="68%"></td>
<td valign="bottom" width="1%"></td>
<td width="1%"></td></tr>
<tr style="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<td bgcolor="#0033a0" rowspan="7" style="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #ffffff" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:1pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:0.63em; font-size:9.5pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#ffffff"><b>We strive to employ good</b></font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; margin-left:0.63em; font-size:9.5pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#ffffff"><b>governance practices</b></font></p></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:1pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:9.5pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font style="font-family:Times New Roman">✓</font></p></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:1pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:9.5pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b><font style="white-space:nowrap">Non-Executive</font>
Chairman</b>The Board annually appoints a <font style="white-space:nowrap">Non-Executive</font> Chairman of the Board and is structured to have a lead director if the Board determines to combine the roles of Chairman of the Board and Chief
Executive Officer. This framework ensures the Board operates independently of management and that directors and shareholders have an independent leadership contact.</p></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top">  </td></tr>
<tr style="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"><font style="font-size:9.5pt"><font style="font-family:Times New Roman">✓</font></font></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:2pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:9.5pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>Majority Vote Standard</b>A director must tender his
or her resignation if his or her election receives less than a majority vote in an uncontested election.</p></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"></td></tr>
<tr style="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"><font style="font-size:9.5pt"><font style="font-family:Times New Roman">✓</font></font></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:2pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:9.5pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>Executive Sessions</b>The independent members of the
Board hold an executive session at each regular Board meeting.</p></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"></td></tr>
<tr style="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"><font style="font-size:9.5pt"><font style="font-family:Times New Roman">✓</font></font></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:2pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:9.5pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>Annual Director Elections</b>Each director stands
for election by the Companys shareholders each year.</p></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"></td></tr>
<tr style="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"><font style="font-size:9.5pt"><font style="font-family:Times New Roman">✓</font></font></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:2pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:9.5pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>Say on Pay</b>We provide shareholders with an annual
advisory vote on named executive officer compensation.</p></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"></td></tr>
<tr style="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"><font style="font-size:9.5pt"><font style="font-family:Times New Roman">✓</font></font></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:2pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:9.5pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>Proxy Access</b>A shareholder, or group of up to 20
shareholders, who have continuously owned at least 3% of our outstanding Common Stock for three years or more may nominate and include in our proxy statement up to the greater of two director nominees or 20% of our Board.</p></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"></td></tr>
<tr style="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" style=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #ffffff" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" style="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #ffffff" valign="top"><font style="font-size:9.5pt"><font style="font-family:Times New Roman">✓</font></font></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" style=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #ffffff" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" style="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #ffffff" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:2pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9.5pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>Special
Meetings</b>Shareholders holding at least 20% of our outstanding common stock may call a special meeting.</p> <p style="font-size:3pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt"> </p></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" style=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #ffffff" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" style="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #ffffff" valign="top"> </td></tr>
<tr style="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<td bgcolor="#0033a0" rowspan="3" style="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #ffffff" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:1pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:0.63em; font-size:9.5pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#ffffff"><b>Our compensation</b></font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:0.63em; font-size:9.5pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#ffffff"><b>program is designed to</b></font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:0.63em; font-size:9.5pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#ffffff"><b>align with shareholder</b></font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; margin-left:0.63em; font-size:9.5pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#ffffff"><b>interests</b></font></p></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"><font style="font-size:8pt"><font style="font-family:Times New Roman">✓</font></font></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"><font style="font-size:9.5pt"><b>Pay for Performance</b>Our executive compensation program links compensation to Company and individual performance over both the short- and long-term.</font></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"></td></tr>
<tr style="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"><font style="font-size:9.5pt"><font style="font-family:Times New Roman">✓</font></font></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"><font style="font-size:9.5pt"><b>Stock Ownership Guidelines</b>We maintain robust stock ownership guidelines for the Chief Executive Officer and other executive officers.</font></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"></td></tr>
<tr style="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" style=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #ffffff" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" style="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #ffffff" valign="top"><font style="font-size:9.5pt"><font style="font-family:Times New Roman">✓</font></font></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" style=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #ffffff" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" style="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #ffffff" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:2pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9.5pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>Double Trigger
Accelerated Vesting</b>Equity awards are subject to a double trigger for accelerated vesting in the event of a change in control followed by termination of employment.</p>
<p style="font-size:3pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt"> </p></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" style=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #ffffff" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" style="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #ffffff" valign="top"> </td></tr>
<tr style="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<td bgcolor="#0033a0" rowspan="7" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:1pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:0.63em; font-size:9.5pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#ffffff"><b>We
strive to adhere to</b></font></p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:0.63em; font-size:9.5pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#ffffff"><b>good executive</b></font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; margin-left:0.63em; font-size:9.5pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#ffffff"><b>compensation practices</b></font></p></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"><font style="font-size:9.5pt"><font style="font-family:Times New Roman">✓</font></font></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"><font style="font-size:9.5pt"><b>Recoupment Policy</b>We maintain a recoupment policy for performance-based cash and equity-based incentive payments in the event of a financial restatement.</font></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"></td></tr>
<tr style="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"><font style="font-size:9.5pt"><font style="font-family:Times New Roman">✓</font></font></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:2pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:9.5pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>Double Trigger Change in Control Agreements</b>We
maintain change in control agreements that provide executives with benefits of up to two times the sum of salary and average annual incentive in the event of a change in control followed by termination of employment.</p></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"></td></tr>
<tr style="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"><font style="font-size:9.5pt"><font style="font-family:Times New Roman">✓</font></font></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:2pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:9.5pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>Independent Compensation Consultant</b>The
Compensation Committee retains an independent compensation consulting firm that provides no other services to the Company.</p></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"></td></tr>
<tr style="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"><font style="font-size:9.5pt"><font style="font-family:Times New Roman"><i>×</i></font></font></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:2pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:9.5pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>No Tax <font style="white-space:nowrap">Gross-ups</font>
and No Excessive Perquisites</b>There are no tax <font style="white-space:nowrap">gross-ups</font> and we provide limited perquisites to executive officers.</p></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"></td></tr>
<tr style="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"><font style="font-size:9.5pt"><font style="font-family:Times New Roman"><i>×</i></font></font></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:2pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:9.5pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>No Hedging</b>Directors and executive officers are
prohibited from engaging in hedging transactions with respect to Company securities.</p></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"></td></tr>
<tr style="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"><font style="font-size:9.5pt"><font style="font-family:Times New Roman"><i>×</i></font></font></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:2pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:9.5pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>No Pledging</b>Effective January 1, 2020,
directors and executive officers are prohibited from pledging Company securities.</p></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"></td></tr>
<tr style="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"><font style="font-size:9.5pt"><font style="font-family:Times New Roman"><i>×</i></font></font></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:2pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9.5pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>No Repricing of Underwater Stock Options</b>The
Brinks Company 2017 Equity Incentive Plan prohibits <font style="white-space:nowrap">re-pricing</font> of underwater stock options without shareholder approval.</p> <p style="font-size:6pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt"> </p></td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td bgcolor="#e5eaf5" valign="top"></td></tr>
</tbody></table>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt"> </p>

<td style="padding-bottom:3pt ;" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:2pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em; font-size:9.5pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#0033a0"></font>  Compensation (Chair)</p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em; font-size:9.5pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#0033a0"></font>  Finance
and Strategy</p></td></tr>

<center><div align="left" style="width:8.5in">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:11pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#0033a0"><b>The Brinks Company </b></font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:14pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>Shareholder Engagement </b></p>
<p style="line-height:4.0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:2pt;border-bottom:1px solid #0033a0"> </p>
<p style="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p><div style="position:relative;float:left; width:48%;padding-right:0%;padding-bottom:8pt;overflow:hidden;padding-top:3pt">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">At last years annual meeting of shareholders, over 99% of votes cast approved the say on pay proposal
regarding the compensation awarded to named executive officers. The Compensation Committee and the Board take into account the results of the say on pay vote as they consider the design of the executive compensation program and policies.
</p></div><div style="position:relative;float:left; margin-left:3%; width:49%;padding-right:0%;padding-bottom:8pt;overflow:hidden;padding-top:3pt">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">There were no changes made to the Companys executive compensation program in direct response to the 2019 say
on pay voting results. Members of management and the Board continue to engage in outreach to the Companys shareholders to discuss governance and compensation policies and practices and emerging
issues.</p></div><div style="clear:both; height:0pt; font-size:0pt"> </div>
<p style="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:14pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>Forward Looking Statements </b></p>
<p style="line-height:4.0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:2pt;border-bottom:1px solid #0033a0"> </p>
<p style="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p><div style="position:relative;float:left; width:48%;padding-right:0%;padding-bottom:8pt;overflow:hidden;padding-top:3pt">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">This Proxy Statement contains forward-looking statements within the meaning of the Private Securities Litigation Reform
Act of 1995. These forward-looking statements relate to future events or to future financial performance and involve known and unknown risks, uncertainties and other factors that may cause our actual results, levels of activity, performance or
achievements to be materially different from any future results, levels of activity, performance or achievements expressed or implied by these statements. In some cases, you can identify forward-looking statements by the use of words such as
may, could, expect, intend, plan, seek, anticipate, believe, estimate, predict, potential or continue, or
the negative of these terms or other comparable terminology. You should not place undue reliance on forward-looking statements because they involve known and unknown risks, uncertainties and other factors that are, in some cases, beyond our control
and that could materially affect our actual results, levels of activity, performance or achievements.
</p></div><div style="position:relative;float:left; margin-left:3%; width:49%;padding-right:0%;padding-bottom:8pt;overflow:hidden;padding-top:3pt">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Other factors that could materially affect actual results, levels of activity, performance or achievements can be found in
our 2019 Annual Report on Form 10-K filed with the SEC on February 28, 2020 and in Quarterly Reports on Form 10-Q and Current Reports on Form 8-K filed or furnished with the SEC. If any of these risks or uncertainties
materialize, or if our underlying assumptions prove to be incorrect, actual results may vary significantly from what we projected. Any forward-looking statement in this Proxy Statement reflects our current views with respect to future events and is
subject to these and other risks, uncertainties and assumptions relating to our operations, results of operations, growth strategy and liquidity. We assume no obligation to publicly update or revise these forward-looking statements for any reason,
whether as a result of new information, future events, or otherwise, except as required by law. </p></div><div style="clear:both; height:0pt; font-size:0pt"> </div>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt"> </p>

<td style="padding-bottom:2pt ;" valign="top"><b>6  </b></td>
<td style=" BORDER-LEFT:1.00pt solid #0033a0" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td style="padding-bottom:2pt ;" valign="top"><i>  <sub style="font-size:85%; vertical-align:bottom">

</sub>    2020 Proxy Statement</i></td></tr></tbody></table>

<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always">
</p></body></html><html><head></head><body><h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>
<center><div align="left" style="width:8.5in">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:11pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#0033a0"><b>The Brinks Company </b></font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:24pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#0033a0"><a name="toc867884_2"></a>QUESTIONS AND ANSWERS ABOUT THE </font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:24pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#0033a0">ANNUAL MEETING </font></p> <p style="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">The mailing address of the principal
executive office of the Company is 1801 Bayberry Court, P.O. Box 18100, Richmond, VA 23226-8100. Following are questions and answers regarding the annual meeting: </p>
<p style="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:14pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>Why am I receiving this proxy statement? </b></p> <p style="line-height:4.0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:2pt;border-bottom:1px solid #0033a0"> </p>
<p style="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p><div style="position:relative;float:left; width:48%;padding-right:0%;padding-bottom:8pt;overflow:hidden;padding-top:3pt">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">You are receiving this proxy statement in connection with the solicitation of proxies by the Board to be voted at the 2020
annual meeting of shareholders (and at any adjournment or postponement of the 2020 annual meeting), for the purposes set forth in the accompanying notice. The annual meeting will be held on May 8, 2020, at 10:00 a.m., local time, at the Hilton
Dallas/Southlake Town Square, 1400 Plaza
</p></div><div style="position:relative;float:left; margin-left:3%; width:49%;padding-right:0%;padding-bottom:8pt;overflow:hidden;padding-top:3pt">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">
Place, Southlake, Texas 76092. In the event it is not possible or advisable to hold our annual meeting in person, we will announce alternative arrangements for the meeting as promptly as
practicable, which may include holding the meeting solely by means of remote communication. Please monitor our annual meeting website at http://investors.brinks.com/2020annualmeetingmaterials for updated information.
</p></div><div style="clear:both; height:0pt; font-size:0pt"> </div>
<p style="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:14pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>What is a proxy? </b></p>
<p style="line-height:4.0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:2pt;border-bottom:1px solid #0033a0"> </p>
<p style="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p><div style="position:relative;float:left; width:48%;padding-right:0%;padding-bottom:8pt;overflow:hidden;padding-top:3pt">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">A proxy is your legal designation of another person to vote the stock you own. If you designate someone as your proxy in a
written document, that document is also called a proxy (or proxy card). Ronald J. Domanico and Lindsay K. Blackwood have been
</p></div><div style="position:relative;float:left; margin-left:3%; width:49%;padding-right:0%;padding-bottom:8pt;overflow:hidden;padding-top:3pt">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">
designated as proxies for the annual meeting. A proxy, if duly executed and not revoked, will be voted and, if it contains any specific instructions, will be voted in accordance with those
instructions. </p></div><div style="clear:both; height:0pt; font-size:0pt"> </div>
<p style="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:14pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>Who is entitled to vote at the annual meeting?
</b></p> <p style="line-height:4.0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:2pt;border-bottom:1px solid #0033a0"> </p>
<p style="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p><div style="position:relative;float:left; width:48%;padding-right:0%;padding-bottom:8pt;overflow:hidden;padding-top:3pt">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">You are entitled to notice of the annual meeting and may vote your shares of Brinks Common Stock if you owned them
as of the close of business March 2, 2020, which is the date that the Board has designated as the record date for the 2020 annual
</p></div><div style="position:relative;float:left; margin-left:3%; width:49%;padding-right:0%;padding-bottom:8pt;overflow:hidden;padding-top:3pt">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">
meeting of shareholders. On March 2, 2020, the Company had outstanding 50,435,866 shares of Brinks Common Stock. Each share of Brinks Common Stock is entitled to one vote.
</p></div><div style="clear:both; height:0pt; font-size:0pt"> </div>
<p style="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:14pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>What am I being asked to vote on? </b></p>
<p style="line-height:4.0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:2pt;border-bottom:1px solid #0033a0"> </p>
<p style="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p><div style="position:relative;float:left; width:48%;padding-right:0%;padding-bottom:8pt;overflow:hidden;padding-top:3pt">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">The proposals scheduled to be voted on are: </p> <p style="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p>
<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" width="100%">
<tbody><tr style="page-break-inside:avoid">
<td align="left" valign="top" width="27">(1)</td>
<td align="left" valign="top"> <p align="left" style=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL; ">Election of directors named in this proxy statement for a <font style="white-space:nowrap">one-year</font> term;
</p></td></tr></tbody></table> <p style="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p>
<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" width="100%">
<tbody><tr style="page-break-inside:avoid">
<td align="left" valign="top" width="27">(2)</td>
<td align="left" valign="top"> <p align="left" style=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL; ">Advisory vote to approve named executive officer compensation; and
</p></td></tr></tbody></table></div><div style="position:relative;float:left; margin-left:3%; width:49%;padding-right:0%;padding-bottom:8pt;overflow:hidden;padding-top:3pt">
<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" width="100%">

</p></td></tr></tbody></table></div><div style="clear:both; height:0pt; font-size:0pt"> </div>
<p style="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:14pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>What are the Boards recommendations?
</b></p> <p style="line-height:4.0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:2pt;border-bottom:1px solid #0033a0"> </p>
<p style="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p><div style="position:relative;float:left; width:48%;padding-right:0%;padding-bottom:8pt;overflow:hidden;padding-top:3pt">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">The Board recommends a vote FOR: </p> <p style="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p>
<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" width="100%">

<td align="right" style="padding-bottom:2pt ;BORDER-RIGHT:1.00pt solid #0033a0; padding-left:8pt" valign="top"><i><sub style="font-size:85%; vertical-align:bottom">

</sub>    2020 Proxy Statement  </i></td>

</div></center>
<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always">
</p></body></html><html><head></head><body><h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>
<center><div align="left" style="width:8.5in">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:11pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#0033a0"><b>The Brinks Company </b></font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:14pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>How many votes must be present to hold the annual meeting? </b></p>
<p style="line-height:4.0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:2pt;border-bottom:1px solid #0033a0"> </p>
<p style="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p><div style="position:relative;float:left; width:48%;padding-right:0%;padding-bottom:8pt;overflow:hidden;padding-top:3pt">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">A majority of the outstanding shares of Brinks Common Stock as of the record date must be present in person or
represented by proxy at the annual meeting. This is referred to as a quorum. Abstentions, withheld votes and shares held in street name (Brokers Shares) voted by brokers are included in determining the number of votes present.
</p></div><div style="position:relative;float:left; margin-left:3%; width:49%;padding-right:0%;padding-bottom:8pt;overflow:hidden;padding-top:3pt">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Brokers Shares that are not voted on any matter will not be included in determining whether a quorum is present. In
the event that a quorum is not present at the annual meeting, we expect that the annual meeting will be adjourned or postponed to solicit additional proxies.
</p></div><div style="clear:both; height:0pt; font-size:0pt"> </div>
<p style="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:14pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>What is a broker
<font style="white-space:nowrap">non-vote?</font> </b></p> <p style="line-height:4.0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:2pt;border-bottom:1px solid #0033a0"> </p>
<p style="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p><div style="position:relative;float:left; width:48%;padding-right:0%;padding-bottom:8pt;overflow:hidden;padding-top:3pt">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Under the rules of the New York Stock Exchange, a broker may vote Brokers Shares in its discretion on routine
matters, but a broker may not vote on proposals that are not considered routine. When a
</p></div><div style="position:relative;float:left; margin-left:3%; width:49%;padding-right:0%;padding-bottom:8pt;overflow:hidden;padding-top:3pt">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">
proposal is a <font style="white-space:nowrap">non-routine</font> matter and the broker has not received voting instructions with respect to that proposal, the broker cannot vote on that
proposal. This is commonly called a broker <font style="white-space:nowrap">non-vote.</font> </p></div><div style="clear:both; height:0pt; font-size:0pt"> </div>
<p style="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:14pt; font-family:ARIAL"><b>How many votes are needed to approve each
proposal? </b></p> <p style="line-height:4.0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:2pt;border-bottom:1px solid #0033a0"> </p>
<p style="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p><div style="position:relative;float:left; width:48%;padding-right:0%;padding-bottom:8pt;overflow:hidden;padding-top:3pt">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">The following table summarizes the vote required to approve each proposal and the effects of abstentions, broker <font style="white-space:nowrap">non-votes,</font> and signed, but unmarked proxy cards, on the tabulation of votes for
</p></div><div style="position:relative;float:left; margin-left:3%; width:49%;padding-right:0%;padding-bottom:8pt;overflow:hidden;padding-top:3pt">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">
each proposal. For any other business that may properly come before the annual meeting, proxies will be voted in accordance with the judgment of the person voting the proxies.
</p></div><div style="clear:both; height:0pt; font-size:0pt"> </div>
<p style="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" width="100%">
<tbody><tr>

<td></td>
<td valign="bottom" width="1%"></td>
<td></td></tr>
<tr style="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:8pt">
<td style="padding-bottom:1pt ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1.00pt solid #0033a0" valign="bottom"> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0.50em; font-size:8pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#0033a0"><b>Proposal</b></font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; text-indent:0.50em; font-size:8pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#0033a0"><b>Number</b></font></p></td>
<td style=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1.00pt solid #0033a0" valign="bottom">  </td>
<td align="center" style="padding-bottom:1pt ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1.00pt solid #0033a0" valign="bottom"><font color="#0033a0"><b>Item</b></font></td>
<td style=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1.00pt solid #0033a0" valign="bottom">  </td>
<td align="center" style="padding-bottom:1pt ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1.00pt solid #0033a0" valign="bottom"> <p align="center" style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:8pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#0033a0"><b>Vote Required</b></font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:8pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#0033a0"><b>for Approval</b></font></p></td>
<td style=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1.00pt solid #0033a0" valign="bottom">  </td>
<td align="center" style="padding-bottom:1pt ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1.00pt solid #0033a0" valign="bottom"><font color="#0033a0"><b>Abstentions</b></font></td>
<td style=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1.00pt solid #0033a0" valign="bottom">  </td>
<td align="center" style="padding-bottom:1pt ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1.00pt solid #0033a0" valign="bottom"> <p align="center" style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:8pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#0033a0"><b>Uninstructed</b></font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:8pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#0033a0"><b>Shares/Effect of</b></font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:8pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#0033a0"><b>Broker Non-</b></font></p> <p align="center" style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:8pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#0033a0"><b>Votes</b></font></p></td>
<td style=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1.00pt solid #0033a0" valign="bottom">  </td>
<td align="center" style="padding-bottom:1pt ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1.00pt solid #0033a0" valign="bottom"> <p align="center" style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:8pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#0033a0"><b>Signed but</b></font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:8pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#0033a0"><b>Unmarked Proxy</b></font></p> <p align="center" style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:8pt; font-family:ARIAL"><font color="#0033a0"><b>Cards</b></font></p></td></tr>
<tr bgcolor="#e5eaf5" style="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<td style="padding-bottom:3pt ;" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:2pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; margin-left:0.40em; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">1.</p></td>
<td valign="bottom">  </td>
<td style="padding-bottom:3pt ;" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:2pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Election of director nominees set forth in this
proxy statement for a <font style="white-space:nowrap">one-year</font> term</p></td>
<td valign="bottom">  </td>
<td style="padding-bottom:3pt ;" valign="bottom"> <p style="font-size:2pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Votes cast in favor must exceed the votes cast
opposing the election of each director</p></td>
<td valign="bottom">  </td>
<td style="padding-bottom:3pt ;" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:2pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-bottom:1pt; margin-top:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">No effect</p></td>
<td valign="bottom">  </td>
<td style="padding-bottom:3pt ;" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:2pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-bottom:1pt; margin-top:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Not voted/<br/>no effect</p></td>
<td valign="bottom">  </td>
<td style="padding-bottom:3pt ;" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:2pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p>
<p align="center" style="margin-bottom:1pt; margin-top:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Voted FOR</p></td></tr>
<tr style="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">

<td valign="bottom">  </td>
<td style="padding-bottom:3pt ;" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:2pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Advisory vote to approve named executive officer
compensation</p></td>

opposing the action</p></td>
<td valign="bottom">  </td>
<td style="padding-bottom:3pt ;" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:2pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-bottom:1pt; margin-top:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">No effect</p></td>
<td valign="bottom">  </td>
<td style="padding-bottom:3pt ;" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:2pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-bottom:1pt; margin-top:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Not voted/<br/>no effect</p></td>
<td valign="bottom">  </td>
<td style="padding-bottom:3pt ;" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:2pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p align="center" style="margin-bottom:1pt; margin-top:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Voted FOR</p></td></tr>
<tr bgcolor="#e5eaf5" style="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<td style="padding-bottom:3pt ;" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:2pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; margin-left:0.40em; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">3.</p></td>
<td valign="bottom">  </td>
<td style="padding-bottom:3pt ;" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:2pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Approval of the selection of KPMG LLP as the
Companys independent registered public accounting firm for 2020</p></td>
<td valign="bottom">  </td>

opposing the action</p></td>
<td valign="bottom">  </td>
<td style="padding-bottom:3pt ;" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:2pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-bottom:1pt; margin-top:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">No effect</p></td>
<td valign="bottom">  </td>
<td style="padding-bottom:3pt ;" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:2pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p style="margin-bottom:1pt; margin-top:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Discretionary<br/>vote by<br/>broker</p></td>
<td valign="bottom">  </td>
<td style="padding-bottom:3pt ;" valign="top"> <p style="font-size:2pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt"> </p> <p align="center" style="margin-bottom:1pt; margin-top:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Voted FOR</p></td></tr>
<tr style="font-size:1px; ">
<td style="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #0033a0" valign="top"> </td>
<td style=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #0033a0" valign="bottom">  </td>
<td style="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #0033a0" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td style=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #0033a0" valign="bottom">  </td>
<td style="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #0033a0" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td style=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #0033a0" valign="bottom">  </td>
<td style="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #0033a0" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td style=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #0033a0" valign="bottom">  </td>
<td style="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #0033a0" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td style=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #0033a0" valign="bottom">  </td>
<td style="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #0033a0" valign="bottom"> </td></tr>
</tbody></table>
<p style="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"> </p><div style="position:relative;float:left; width:48%;padding-right:0%;padding-bottom:8pt;overflow:hidden;padding-top:3pt">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">The Companys bylaws provide that the Chairman of the annual meeting will determine the order of business and the
voting and other procedures to be observed at the annual meeting. The Chairman is authorized to declare whether any business is properly brought before the annual meeting, and business not properly brought before the annual meeting will not be
transacted. We are not aware of
</p></div><div style="position:relative;float:left; margin-left:3%; width:49%;padding-right:0%;padding-bottom:8pt;overflow:hidden;padding-top:3pt">
<p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">
any matters that are to come before the annual meeting other than those described in this proxy statement. If other matters do properly come before the annual meeting, however, it is the
intention of the persons named in the enclosed proxy card to exercise the discretionary authority conferred by the proxy to vote such proxy in accordance with their best judgment.
</p></div><div style="clear:both; height:0pt; font-size:0pt"> </div>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt"> </p>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" width="100%">
<tbody><tr>
<td></td>
<td valign="bottom" width="1%"></td>
<td width="97%"></td></tr>
<tr style="font-size:1pt">
<td height="2"></td>
<td colspan="2" height="2" style="BORDER-LEFT:1.00pt solid #0033a0"> </td></tr>
<tr style="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<td style="padding-bottom:2pt ;" valign="top"><b>8  </b></td>
<td style=" BORDER-LEFT:1.00pt solid #0033a0" valign="bottom"> </td>
<td style="padding-bottom:2pt ;" valign="top"><i>  <sub style="font-size:85%; vertical-align:bottom">
<img alt="LOGO" src="g867884g23_51.jpg"/>
</sub>    2020 Proxy Statement</i></td></tr></tbody></table>
